original_solution_mapping.L1: Black printer inks will cost him 2 x $11 = $<<2*11=22>>22.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Red printer inks will cost him 3 x $15 = $<<3*15=45>>45.
original_solution_mapping.L3: And yellow printer inks will cost him 2 x $13 = $<<2*13=26>>26.
original_solution_mapping.L4: The total amount he has to pay for the printer inks is $22 + $45 + $26 = $<<22+45+26=93>>93
original_solution_mapping.L5: Therefore, Phantom has to ask $93 - $50 = $<<93-50=43>>43 more from his mom to be able to buy the printer inks.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5640.
    Returns: the additional money Phantom needs to buy all printer inks.
    """
    # L1
    num_black_inks = 2 # two black printer inks
    cost_black_ink = 11 # cost $11 each
    cost_black_inks = num_black_inks * cost_black_ink

    # L2
    num_red_inks = 3 # three red printer inks
    cost_red_ink = 15 # cost $15 each
    cost_red_inks = num_red_inks * cost_red_ink

    # L3
    num_yellow_inks = 2 # two yellow printer inks
    cost_yellow_ink = 13 # cost $13 each
    cost_yellow_inks = num_yellow_inks * cost_yellow_ink

    # L4
    total_cost_inks = cost_black_inks + cost_red_inks + cost_yellow_inks

    # L5
    money_given = 50 # gave him $50
    money_to_ask = total_cost_inks - money_given

    # FA
    answer = money_to_ask
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Black printer inks will cost him {num_black_inks} x ${cost_black_ink} = $<<{num_black_inks}*{cost_black_ink}={cost_black_inks}>>{cost_black_inks}.
Red printer inks will cost him {num_red_inks} x ${cost_red_ink} = $<<{num_red_inks}*{cost_red_ink}={cost_red_inks}>>{cost_red_inks}.
And yellow printer inks will cost him {num_yellow_inks} x ${cost_yellow_ink} = $<<{num_yellow_inks}*{cost_yellow_ink}={cost_yellow_inks}>>{cost_yellow_inks}.

The total amount he has to pay for the printer inks is ${cost_black_inks} + ${cost_red_inks} + ${cost_yellow_inks} = $<<{cost_black_inks}+{cost_red_inks}+{cost_yellow_inks}={total_cost_inks}>>{total_cost_inks}
Therefore, Phantom has to ask ${total_cost_inks} - ${money_given} = $<<{total_cost_inks}-{money_given}={money_to_ask}>>{money_to_ask} more from his mom to be able to buy the printer inks.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Red printer inks will cost him 3 x $15 = $<<3*15=45>>45.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: And yellow printer inks will cost him 3 x $13 = $<<3*13=39>>39.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L5: Therefore, Phantom has to ask $106 - $50 = $<<106-50=56>>56 more from his mom to be able to buy the printer inks.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'num_red_inks' (3) was used instead of 'num_yellow_inks' (2).
